scripts.startHLF: cd test/fixtures && DOCKER_IMG_TAG=:x86_64-1.1.0-preview docker-compose up --force-recreate && cd ../.. && npm run tearDownHLF
scripts.tearDownHLF: cd test/fixtures && DOCKER_IMG_TAG=:x86_64-1.1.0-preview docker-compose down && rm -rf /tmp/hfc-{k,c}vs; cd ../.. npm run clean
scripts.clean: docker rm -f -v $(docker ps -a | grep 'dev-peer' | awk '{print $1}') 2>/dev/null; docker rmi $(docker images | grep 'dev-peer' | awk '{print $1}') 2>/dev/null
